categories.title: Ex-Muslim Voices and Islamic Critics
categories.description: Former Muslims courageously sharing their deconversion journeys, critical analyses of Islamic theology, and providing invaluable support for those questioning their faith. These creators offer personal testimonies, scholarly research, and compassionate communities.

categories.title: Christian Apologists / Critics of Islam
categories.description: Christian content creators engaging in apologetics and comparative religious analysis. These channels provide Christian perspectives on Islamic theology through debates, textual criticism, and interfaith discussions, **These can be BIASED at times**.

categories.title: Atheist & Philosophy Channels
categories.description: Channels championing secular humanism, philosophical inquiry, and scientific skepticism. These creators promote rational thinking, evidence-based reasoning, and critical examination of all religious claims.

creators.name: Apostate Aladdin
creators.description: Engaging debates, Islamic critiques, and ex-Muslim advocacy with humor and sharp, calm analysis.

creators.name: Apostate Prophet
creators.description: Detailed critiques of Islamic doctrine, Quranic analysis, and ex-Muslim perspectives.

creators.name: Friendly Ex-Muslim (Abdullah Sameer)
creators.description: Thoughtful discussions on leaving Islam, interfaith dialogues, and rational skepticism.

creators.name: Hasan Radwan
creators.description: Knowledgable and philosophical explorations of Islamic theology, morality debates, and deconversion stories.

creators.name: Masked Arab
creators.description: In-depth historical analysis and critiques of Islamic texts in Arabic, also covers many religions.

creators.name: Sherif Gaber
creators.description: Egyptian atheist activist known for satirical videos critiquing religion and dogma.

creators.name: Nabi Asli
